extendedInfo.description: EasilyDo gets you the right information and gets things done. It is the only smart assistant that works proactively to check traffic before your commute, warn you of bad weather, organize contacts, track packages, and celebrate birthdays. Information appears just when you need itâno need to dig through multiple apps!Critically acclaimed:â¢ âA stellar helperâ â PC Magazine â¢ Business Insiderâs â13 Useful Apps You Needâ for 2013 â¢ â...feel all smug about your productivityâ â TechCrunch â¢ â...central hub for all of those personal things you need to doâ â Lifehacker â¢ ABC7 News, Forbes, Reuters, AllThingsD, Fast Company, GigaOM, Computerworld, The Next Web, TMCnet, PandoDaily and more â¢What users say:â¢ âKeeps me on top of birthdays, appointments, etc. I love how it merges contacts!â â CRSmommyâ¢ âEasy to use! Everything all in one spot!!! Click and done!!! Super!â â Kcreyesâ¢ âCatches things I didn't even know I was missing!â â Carlislejbâ¢ â...saved ten minutes in 10 seconds! Awesome!â â Phones18163â¢ âExcellent - More features than Tempo.â â Jeu537â¢ âMy go to everyday app!â â Nestor FajotaUse EasilyDoâs 27+ âDo Itsâ to streamline the following tasks:Android Calendar (and synced calendars) â¢ Receive an alert when itâs time to goâ¢ Call, email, or text attendees with prewritten messages (e.g. running late, just arrived)â¢ Get directions, estimated drive time, and nearby parkingâ¢ Dial into conference calls with passcodesâ¢ View attendeesâ LinkedIn profilesAndroid Contacts (and synced address books)â¢ Merge duplicate contactsEmail (Gmail, Yahoo! Mail, Exchange, IMAP)â¢ Receive an alert for emails from a certain person and/or with certain wordsâ¢ Show boarding passes (for select airlines)â¢ View confirmations for hotel, restaurant (OpenTable), movies (Fandango), and events (Eventbrite, Meetup, Ticketmaster) and mark your calendarâ¢ RSVP to invitations (GCal, Evite)â¢ Congratulate a LinkedIn connection on a job changeâ¢ Track packagesâ¢ Get reminded when bills are dueâ¢ Respond to emails with Gmail Quick Actionsâ¢ File receipts (with option to save to Evernote)â¢ Backup emails and attachments to Dropbox/Evernoteâ¢ Clean out expired deals and old calendar remindersFacebookâ¢ Get birthday remindersâ¢ Draft âHappy Birthdayâ messages and schedule to deliver via email or Facebook postâ¢ RSVP to events and mark your calendarâ¢ Catch important news and popular updates from friendsâ¢ View top photos of the day and photos you're tagged inâ¢ Sync your Facebook profile photo to TwitterLocationâ¢ Check traffic for daily commuteâ¢ View local weatherâ¢ Receive bad weather alerts the night beforeExtrasâ¢ Perform monthly privacy checkups on apps accessing your personal informationCreate your own âDo Itsâ in Builder (builder.easilydo.com).Supports Android 2.3 or higher.Your data is always yours and always protected. You select which services you want to connect with EasilyDo and which âDo Itsâ to keep turned on under each service.Our support team is here to offer answers and assistance. Contact us within the app (Account > Support) or email (support@easilydo.com) for a faster response.Follow us:http://twitter.com/easilydohttp://www.facebook.com/EasilydoHow easy do you want to make your smart assistant experience? With Easily Do, make your life simpler.Keywords: "Easily do" "easy do" "easily do" "easily" "Do It"  "productivity" "Get things done" "Easily do your tasks"

reviews.title: Getting There
reviews.comment: For where it is in its development,  it\'s a great app. It has some distance to go to be more useful than pretty, but this is a good attempt at making something productivity-aiding as well as enjoyable. Looking forward to its evolution.
reviews.author: Dan Sanders

reviews.title: Facebook offline
reviews.comment: Nice app...but since last few days, I am getting notifications time and again that facebook connection is offline.
reviews.author: Sandeep Parkhi

reviews.title: Uses lots of data!
reviews.comment: Useful application, but uses a lot of my mobile data allowance (maybe it can be configured to use less, our check less often).
reviews.author: Andy Younie

reviews.comment: This is an excellent access to everyone and their comments along wirh birthday\'s. Perfect!!
reviews.author: Billy Zepp, Sr.

reviews.comment: Help! so close to perfect, but not if one has allot of friends on Facebook!\tI love this application BUT it does not do even half of what it says. I\'ve over a THOUSAND PLUS FRIENDS on Facebook and want to see all my posts on Easily Do!  Please help.  I love Easily Do and every one Loves the posts I do and mentions how cool it is.   I want this to work in the worst way!
reviews.author: Rene\'e Benson

reviews.title: Extremely Handy
reviews.comment: Very convenient tool
reviews.author: Deb Fisher

reviews.comment: Taking too much of battery on my phone galaxy s3
reviews.author: Ashish Sharma

reviews.title: Good app but...
reviews.comment: UPDATE: Once I removed my calendars, everything works great! 5 Stars... I appreciate the quick reply I received from my comments.  Was not expecting that!......  I love the Facebook Birthday Notifications, but even though I don\'t have any calender notifications turned on, I keep getting them!  Ugh!!!  This never happen before, then all of a sudden, they won\'t stop.  I\'ve uninstalled and re-installed but the same thing happens.  I may just have to uninstall and wait for an update because I have a lot on my calendar.  I hope they fix this... until then 3 stars.
reviews.author: Kelli Wallace
